official_title: To amend chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that any survivor annuity for a child that terminates by reason of such child marrying shall resume, absent any other disqualifying event or condition, if and when that marriage ends.

summary.text: Amends Federal civil service law to provide that if the annuity of a child terminates because of marriage, then, if such marriage ends, the annuity shall resume on the first day of the month on which the marriage ends, but only if: (1) any lump sum payment is returned to the appropriate fund; and (2) such individual is not otherwise ineligible for such annuity.
